Short Bio

I am a second-year PhD student at Purdue University, studying for a computer science degree under the supervision of Prof. Raymond A. Yeh

I am broadly interested in Computer Vision, Machine Learning and Robotics, with a focus on 3D vision and multi-modal learning. My current project focus on Semantic 3D Gaussian Splatting. I have also worked on projects related to stylized novel views generation from 2D image.

I received my Bachelor's degrees from University of Wisconsin-Madison in 2023, where I have worked with Prof. Yin Li for one year.

Hairong Yin
Email: yin178@purdue.edu
